description: An aftermarket nylon waist belt with webbing for MOLLE pouches throughout its length.  It is tough and will withstand harsh combat conditions well.

variants.description: A nylon waist belt combining two parts: an inner belt with hook-and-loop surface throughout its length, and an outer belt that attaches to the hook-and-loop surface.  PALS webbing on the outer belt allows attaching MOLLE pouches, and the belt itself can support tactical belt accessories.  Additionally, this belt can support up to two large or leg-strapped pieces of gear attached to it.  It is designed to be worn as support for a pair of pants, but can be worn separately.  <variant_multicam>

description: A low-profile belt with webbing for MOLLE pouches, commonly worn by police officers while on duty.  Quite comfortable to wear even when fully-loaded.

variants.description: A low-profile, sturdy black belt with PALS webbing.  A "duty belt" in the sense of being worn by police officers while on duty, it features plenty of space for pouches to hold items such a duty would imply.  It's surprisingly comfortable even with a large amount of pouches attached.  <variant_black>

notes: we assume 38 in. as the standard belt length, for the sake of consistency between different belts
